title: A simple REST response schema for a payload for a non-succesful response.This schema allows you to add structured information that can be consumed by an API consumer in a standard way. HTTP status codes should indicate what went wrong.

messages.description: an array of message objects related to the failure

items.description: an object that contains fields related to a failure

message.description: A meaningful, end-user-readable (or at the least log-worthy) message, explaining what happened.

field.description: an optional string representation that maps to input. POST keys, a query parameter, a header key etc. For complex datastructures you could use different solutions like a dot seperated tree representation, an xpath expression etc.

code.description: A numeric code providing info about a failure or error in a result, if applicable
